name: Eagle Hunting Journey
description:
Eagle Hunting Journey is a wildlife simulator which gives players a chance to explore a life in the wilderness from an astonishing perspective - the one of an eagle. The eagle has only one goal - surviving the day by hunting. Persisting in spite of the dangers, he thrives in the wonderful green landscapes, which he calls his home. In order to maintain his health, the eagle must constantly catch new prey and stay hydrated.
Once he becomes an advanced hunter, the eagle gets a chance to find a mating partner and start a family. When the two birds meet, the eagle must build a nest and hunt for prey to feed his young ones.
We have brought you the most advanced eagle simulator game to make your experience as exciting as possible. Explore an enormous world in front of you, hunt 24 different kinds of prey, build a nest, raise your young ones and become the king of the sky. If you are into action-packed addictive games, then this eagle simulator is just perfect for you. The Eagle Hunting Journey is an adventurous game that is easy to play. The green forests, blue lakes & 3D wildlife graphics will soothe your eyes.
If you are looking for the ultimate game that will keep you excited throughout the gameplay, install our eagle bird simulator and start your hunting journey. Survive in the wild, raise a family of eagles, and be the fiercest predator of the forests, planes and mountains. Happy Gaming!
